body:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: $appName
  labels:
    app: $appName
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: $appName
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: $appName
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: $appName
          image: $dockerImage
      imagePullSecrets:
        - name: docker-repo
---
kind: Service
apiVersion: v1
metadata:
  name: $appName
spec:
  selector:
    app: $appName
  ports:
    - port: $Port
---
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: $appName
  annotations:
    ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
spec:
  rules:
    - host: $appName.com
      http:
        paths:
          - path: /
            backend:
              serviceName: $appName
              servicePort: $Port
